title: Klimoto Radiator With Out Transmission Cooler | fits Subaru Impreza 2004-2007 2.0L 2.5L H4 | Replaces 45111FE101
features: VEHICLE SPECIFIC: Klimoto parts are designed and manufactured to meet or exceed OE specifications for form, fit, and function and configured specifically for your vehicle.
FOLDED FIN DESIGN - Our fins are folded to increase cooling capacity for better radiator performance.
REDUCE OVERHEATING - 26mm core instead of the tradition 16mm core, our radiators greatly reduce chance of overheating
THERMAL CUTS - Thermal expansions reduce radiator failure by allowing greater core expansion and contraction
Lifetime Warranty: All our products come with Lifetime warranty for manufactuerer defects. Please contact us for details
description: Radiators are the foundation of any engine cooling system. Tasked with preventing the vehicle from overheating, the radiator is vital to keeping vehicles up and running. Klimoto designs and manufactures all of its radiators to meet or exceed Original Equipment specifications. Klimoto takes great pride in producing the most reliable replacement parts in the market.Warranty : This product has life time warranty for manufacturere defects. If there is a defect issue with the item we must be contacted we will confirm purchase with basic ship to information name address. We must confirm the defect issue in order to replace. Before six months we take care of all shipping. After six months we will take care of the shipping of the replacement but the purchaser is required to ship in for testing. Length of warranty is based on Product Category.
